name: Lomse
short_description:
Files and source code are available at 
https//launchpad.net/lomse

LenMus open music score edition library (Lomse library) for C++ is a free open source library to add capabilities to any program for editing, rendering and playing back music scores. It is witten in C++ and it is platform independent.
summary: A free library to render and edit music scores
